item.description:
Bowling & Dinner

Join us for bowling & dinner.  We will bowl 2 strings (a 3rd is optional). After bowling we will go for dinner nearby in Quincy to Grand Chinatown, 21 Billings Rd. 

Come out and have some fun and meetup with others. All levels welcome.

Dinner will follow bowling - we will make reservations for 7:30 pm or so.

RSVP - this RSVP is for both bowling & dinner unless you indicate otherwise. 

Transportation - if you need a ride please indicate which town and/or T stop you are located. Our members are pretty good about offering carpools.

Cost - each string cost $5.75 and bowling shoe rental cost $4.75 (see their website: http://www.bostonbowl.com/bowl.html)

Please only RSVP if you intend to go. If your plans change, update your RSVP asap.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be at the front desk area (bowling shoe rentals).

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Bowling & Dinner
